title: [Alpha Client] Keep downloading update in loop
body:
Hi,

The Alpha Client is trying to update. It starts downloading a 1065.9 MB, and after a while display briefly a message I don't have enough time to read then starts the download again from scratch, without me taking any action at any point.

I'm 99.9% sure it's not an unstable connection issue. What else can it be?

(Disclaimer:

* I looked for similar topics on the first page of the Help & Support board, but didn't find anything
* I looked for the dedicated Alpha Client board, but I can't find it in the side-bar, and I can't access it from the client, since it keeps trying to update.

)

replies.body:
I've actually had this happen to me before, and I think it's just a quirk with the Alpha Client at the moment. I worked around this by patching with the old Client/Patcher, then hopping back onto the Alpha Client.

Let me know if that works for you, also you can find the Alpha Client Boards [here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)

Yo,

Quick update on the situation + feedback:

* I removed a few files from my hard-drive and now it works. Great!
* I'm a little surprised that the client doesn't check by itself if there is enough room, and when it encounters an error that it loops infinitely instead of shutting-down and/or displaying an error message.

I already updated through the old client, but no luck, the new is still not working. (Actually, I spent the night playing in the old client, given the lack of alternative, so I'm 100% sure the update is done.)

It may be a problem with lack of space on my hard drive, I'll check that tomorrow and keep you updated.
